+Nike Zeuzs king of god Yes but Superman doesn't look Asian, and neither does Goku.

+Weaksauceization in case you dont know, Son Goku was inspired by Sun WuKong a monkey king from Chinese mythical gods and monsters folklore tale. he appeared in Chinese classical novel its called Journey to the West, and there he also appeared in Japanese novel called One Hundreds Aspect of the moon. think about like Greek gods or Viking gods where there are Hercules or Thor. now, Hercules and Thor is obviously white because Hercules from Greek and Thor from Sweden/Norwegian folklore right? and Sun Wukong are from Chinese..so what makes you think Goku is not asian?

+295lovetolslam2 Goku looks white and is not Asian, he is saiyan. This means that he could be either white appearance (as he appears in the show) or asian (cultural influence) in the movies. Sun Wukong also didn't look asian, he looked like a (spoilers) monkey. You're trying to shoehorn art to fit a racial agenda, that is wrong.

+Weaksauceization i didnt tried to shoehorn art. akira toriyama (Dragon Ball creator) confirmed himself that Goku are based by Sun wukong. and Sun wukong doesnt have a whole monkey face in Journey of the West, means he is chinese asian. and he is japs in One Hundreds Aspect of the Moon. bottom line he is asian. Goku looks white and is not asian, he is saiyan..so you are saying all saiyan are caucasian? and also just because his appearance changed into blonde hair and with blue eyes when he turns into super saiyan in the show? never heard akira toriyama say that.

He is an alien, neither Caucasian nor white. Yet the Saiyan race looks white in the cartoon. Thats simply a fact no matter what racial agenda youre still trying to shoehorn into the art. Next you'll be saying that Spike from Cowboy Bebop is Asian too. My point is, that Goku can be cast as either Asian or White because he is simply neither. If you dont understand that hes an ALIEN and NOT ASIAN then you cant even call yourself a fan of the show, because you dont understand the origin of Goku and his race.

ikr dude this movie nothing related to dbz. Goku doesn't use Kamehameha with one hand! Bulma barely fights and doesn't have black hair! master roshi has a beard, he's bald, and he's WAYYY more perverted. piccolos ears are way bigger than that and greener. also, PICCOLO DOSENT USE A FREAKING SWORD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! there any frickin jeeps in dragon ball z! I thought goku and piccolo can fly. if ur a dbz fan and if u like this, than u don't know ANYTHING about dragon ball z. weres everybody else? even a parody can do better than this!!!this movie is a waste of my time, so I'm just gonna forget about this horrible movie that has NOTHING related to dbz.

+Weaksauceization His name is Son Goku. His character is based on the Monkey King (Japanese name Sun Wukong), which is derived from Chinese mythology.
